title: Sisterhood of Steel
description: In an age of angels and men, a warning was sent to herald the coming of a Godforsaken foe. Over twenty-six hundred years later, the hour of man has finally come. At the forefront of that struggle is Grand Matriarch Ana’Lira Heartstone and her reluctant granddaughter, Rain. The blades are raised and a sisterhood of steel takes a journey fraught with magic and death, while haunted by the lost histories of men. Now a prophet’s words, a family’s faith and a woman’s love for a child are all that stand between mankind and utter destruction. Let the legend begin...
author: L.H. Nail
